file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'BSM Option Price'
  version: '1.0.0'
  description: 'An API that returns the price of an option given the stock variables'
  contact:
    name: sam
    email: samdcaek@gmail.com
paths:
  /stockPrice:
    get:
      summary: Returns the BSM option price
      parameters:
        - name: otype
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Option type call or put
          
        - name: S
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Current Stock price
        - name: K
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Option Strike Price
        - name: tm
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Time until maturity
        - name: r
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Risk free interest rate
        - name: d
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Stock's dividend yield
        - name: sig
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          description: Stock's volatility
      responses:
        200:
          description: Sucessful calculation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  properties: 
                    otype:
                      type: string
                      example: c
                      
                    S:
                      type: number
                      example: 100.11
                    
                    K:
                      type: number
                      example: 100.11
                      
                    tm:
                      type: number
                      example: 0.5
                    
                    r:
                      type: number
                      example: 0.05
                      
                    d:
                      type: number
                      example: 0.03
                      
                    sig:
                      type: number
                      example: 0.2
                      
                    o_price:
                      type: number
                      example: 7.50
